projects.title: Green Basket - Digital Foodbank App
projects.desc: As a team of 6 at the School of Code, we built a full-stack digital food bank web app that allows various users to reserve and donate food items, find foodbanks local to them and manage food bank inventory in an interactive, stigma-free manner.

projects.title: School of Code Proficiency Tracker
projects.desc: I worked as a team to develop a web app that would enhance the learning experience of fellow School of Code bootcampers. We built a proficiency tracker which enables bootcampers to track their progress and learning throughout their 16-week journey
